sources.title: Trigger Pals (1939)
sources.description: Kent wants the Allen ranch. So he has Steve and his men rustle their cattle using Pete as an informant. When the Trigger Pals Lucky, Stormy, and Fuzzy fight back, Kent frames Stormy for the rustling. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/trigger-pals-1939/

sources.title: Trigger Pals (1939)  WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Arthur Jarrett, Lee Powell, Al St. John
 Director: Sam Newfield

 Kent wants the Allen ranch. So he has Steve and his men rustle their cattle using Pete as an informant. When the Trigger Pals Lucky, Stormy, and Fuzzy fight back, Kent frames Stormy for the rustling.

metadata.Plot: Kent wants the Allen ranch. So he has Steve and his men rustle their cattle using Pete as an informant. When the Trigger Pals Lucky, Stormy, and Fuzzy fight back, Kent frames Stormy for the rustling.
metadata.Actors: Arthur Jarrett, Lee Powell, Al St. John
